channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP PowerDesigner Client
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP PowerDesigner Client

item.title: CVE-2023-40621|2024-09-25T15:25:02.097Z -- sap_se -- sap%20powerdesigner%20client
item.description: SAP PowerDesigner Client - version 16.7, allows an unauthenticated attacker to inject VBScript code in a document and have it opened by an unsuspecting user, to have it executed by the application on behalf of the user. The application has a security option to disable or prompt users before untrusted scripts are executed, but this is not set as default.
